channel.title: Lab Testing on Sovereign Self Health

item.title: Adrenal Fatigue Is Real (Even If Your Doctor Says It Isn't)
item.description:
You wake up exhausted despite sleeping 8 hours. You need multiple cups of coffee just to feel human by noon. You hit a wall around 2pm that makes you want to crawl under your desk. But then, right when you should be winding down for bed, you get a second windâ€”feeling wired, anxious, unable to shut your brain off.

You drag yourself to the doctor, certain something is wrong with your adrenal glands.
